授業方法: Lecture. PPP presentation and class discussion; the course follows a seminar approach

第1回: Introduction: Why does regional economic integration matter?
第2回: Regional economic integration from a historical perspective: The Latin monetary union and its failure
第3回: Regional economic integration in Europe 1
第4回: Regional economic integration in Europe 2
第5回: Regional economic integration in Europe 3
第6回: The EU and its free trade agreements: From CETA with Canada to EPA with Japan
第7回: Regional economic integration in North America 1 (NAFTA)
第8回: Regional economic integration in North America 2 (USMCA)
第9回: Asian economic integration (ASEAN 1)
第10回: Asian economic integration (ASEAN 2)
第11回: Mercosur: Regional economic cooperation in Middle and South America
第12回: The Arab Maghreb Union: Prospects of a North African economic integration
第13回: African Union (AU) and Gulf Cooperation Council (GCC)
第14回: Is regional integration a model of the past? The future of regional economic integration in times of populism and right wing nationalism.
トピック.授業外学習2: Students are expected to gain a broad overview over the existing research on regional economic integration by selective reading (guidance will be given in class)
